articles.title: Shift4 Launches Stablecoin Settlements For Merchants, Shares Climb
articles.mainIdea: Shift4 Launches Stablecoin Settlements For Merchants, Shares Climb
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Shift4 Launches Stablecoin Settlements For Merchants, Shares Climb. Shift4 Payments announces it will allow merchants to settle payments and transfers with stablecoins, including USDC, USDT and more. Related tickers mentioned: ETH-USD, EURC-USD, FOUR, FOUR-PA, MATIC-USD, SOL-USD, USDC-USD.

articles.title: Why Snap (SNAP) Stock Is Up Today
articles.mainIdea: Why Snap (SNAP) Stock Is Up Today
articles.summary: StockStory: Why Snap (SNAP) Stock Is Up Today. Shares of social network Snapchat (NYSE: SNAP) jumped 3.4% in the afternoon session after the company introduced a new AI-powered video generation tool, and an investor dropped a lawsuit concerning its advertising revenue.

articles.title: FBI exposes major SNAP fraud in Boston, where $7M in food stamps for hungry families were allegedly stolen. Here’s how
articles.mainIdea: FBI exposes major SNAP fraud in Boston, where $7M in food stamps for hungry families were allegedly stolen. Here’s how
articles.summary: Moneywise: FBI exposes major SNAP fraud in Boston, where $7M in food stamps for hungry families were allegedly stolen. Here’s how. The defendants are also accused of selling pre-packaged meals that are meant for starving children overseas.
